text: Cun Alloh onhoro az ʙahr naçot dod, ʙinī, ki dar zamin ʙa nohaq sarkaşī kunand ʙa sūji gunoh va fasodkorī dar zamin ʙarmegardand. Ej mardum, in sarkaşī ʙa zijoni xudaton ast. Manfiat meʙared dar in zindagii dunjavī. On goh hama ʙa nazdi Mo ʙozmegarded, to az korhoe, ki mekarded, ogohaton sozem
